table.name: vtiger_sales_detail
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_sales_detail` ( `salesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` decimal(8,3) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_price` decimal(25,4) DEFAULT NULL, `total_price` decimal(25,4) DEFAULT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: vtiger_vtpos_config
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vtpos_config` ( `ticket_header` varchar(255) NOT NULL default 'VtPos', `ticket_footer` varchar(255) NOT NULL default 'Thank you for shopping with VtPos Have a wonderful day', `ticket_header_image` varchar(255), `credit_enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `credit_card_enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `vtiger_unique_key` varchar(255), `pos_unique_key` varchar(255), `stripe_is_test` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `stripe_test_key` varchar(255), `stripe_live_key` varchar(255), `function` text) ENGINE=InnoDB
